text:
Hello Guys
My company has downgraded to free version and now when we want to send Newslettet email we cannot I get following issue:
so my question I can still keep the free version and somehow keep using this feature?
Yeah same here!
Two websites already having that exact issue
Can you share an example where this is still happening please?
<https://www.processionals.nl/vacatures/>
It’s causing a redirect right now because the detail page is a 404

Same problem here, with  hubdb and crm object based websites.
any ideas?

Looks like the issue is with bad links on the listing pages, dynamically generated detail pages should actually for the most part be okay. We are working on programmatically re-rendering the listing pages, but if you need it resolved ASAP you can just update the listing page and it should resolve.
After updating the listing page it works for 1-2 minutes then they are broken again. We tried it several times throughout the day
Does anyone have any examples of HubDB dynamic pages actively 404ing?
<@UGDF9EBPW> what is supposed to be going on here <https://www.processionals.nl/vacatures/>? Is the issue now rows are showing up on the listing page?

> After updating the listing page it works for 1-2 minutes then they are broken again. We tried it several times throughout the day
We updated some logic 10:05 AM EST today. So did u face this issue of breaking again 1-2 mins later after 10:o5 AM EST or before that time?
ah ok, thanks for the info! I’ll try again right away
Just tested it again, unfortunately it still doesn’t work..
Can you share your example, please?

Here you have an example of crm object bases pages, 90% of them are not accessible:
<https://www.baufi24.de/standorte/>

From another customer based on HubDB
<https://media.usu.com/en-us/resources/thank-you/24/software-asset-management-get-started-in-5-steps>
Seems to be working again!
Okay we think we have figured out what was causing it. Anyone have any things still not working?

<@UGDF9EBPW> what is supposed to be going on here <https://www.processionals.nl/vacatures/>. The detail pages are working <https://www.processionals.nl/vacatures/procesoperator-textiel-2-of-3-ploegen-a0w7q000000d0n2qai>. Is the listing page broken, or is there bad code and that is why there is nothing on the listing page?

Yes, seems to be working again. THANK YOU :pray:
Want to share with us what the problem was?
We are still fully investigating the cause, we will report back once we know exactly what happened, just focusing on getting things back online for the moment. Thanks for your patience!
But at a high level, we are making a number of performance improvements to HubDB page rendering, and seemed to have crossed some wires!

does anyone know if I remove a domain and business unit if I can either a.) recover it back into the account or b.) connect it on a new HubSpot account. the website is down after removing the domain from the existing HubSpot account and trying to get it back up.
Thank you for the thoughtful and well presented reply.  I'd completely forgotten about the contacts API and am looking into this approach.  Cheers.
